# Adamantine Battleaxe
## Overview
**Aura** no aura (nonmagical); **CL** â€”

**Slot** none

**Price** 3,010 gp

**Weight** 6 lbs.

**Description**

This nonmagical axe is made out of [[Adamantine|adamantine]]. As a masterwork weapon, it has a +1 enhancement bonus on attack rolls.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg.  472
